name: Mark Hill
description: '''Mark Leslie Hill''' (born 22 December 1972) is a Welsh musician, songwriter and record producer. He rose to fame as one half of the [[Artful Dodger (duo)|Artful Dodger]] and co-writer and producer of [[Craig David]]'s multi-platinum debut studio album, ''[[Born to Do It]]''. Since he began releasing music in 1997, Hill has achieved four [[Ivor Novello Awards]], a number one album, two number one singles and over 10 million records sales worldwide.
